title: Real Estate Cold Callers
job_overview:
As a Real Estate Cold Caller, you will be responsible for contacting property owners and potential sellers.

Key Responsibilities:

Make outbound cold calls to property owners using provided scripts and tools
Identify motivated sellers and gather key information on properties
Qualify leads based on company criteria and set appointments for acquisition managers
Maintain and update CRM with accurate call notes and lead statuses
Meet or exceed daily/weekly call and conversion targets
Handle objections and rejections professionally and persistently
Follow up with potential leads to nurture relationships and encourage engagement

Qualifications:

Proven experience in cold calling, telemarketing, or real estate lead generation preferred
Excellent English communication skills (verbal and written)
Confident, persistent, and able to handle rejection
Comfortable working with CRM software, dialers, and spreadsheets
Self-motivated and able to work independently with minimal supervision
Strong organizational and time management skills
